sql.query:
UPDATE charges_family
SET total = :P1 /* {{totals.familygrandtotal}} */, basetotal = :P2 /* {{totals.basetotal}} */, discountotal = :P3 /* {{totals.discountotal}} */, chargeDate = :P4 /* {{totals.chargeDate}} */, updated = :P5 /* {{NOW_UTC.toLocalTime().formatDate('yyyy-mm-dd')}} */, updatedby = :P6 /* {{$_PARAM.userid}} */
WHERE id = :P7 /* {{$_GET.monthlychargeexists.chargeid}} */

options.comment: Check here whether or not lineInvNumber's match up. If so, update, else, remove and insert new

sql.query:
DELETE FROM charges_enrolments ce
WHERE ce.lineInvNumber NOT IN(:P1)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total
FROM charges_enrolments
WHERE lineInvNumber = :P1 /* {{lineInvNumber_forInsert}} */

UPDATE charges_enrolments
SET startofweek = :P1 /* {{startofweek}} */, classId = :P2 /* {{classId}} */, studentid = :P3 /* {{student}} */, classTypeId = :P4 /* {{classType}} */, enrolid = :P5 /* {{id}} */, classDate = :P6 /* {{classdate.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}} */, baseRate = :P7 /* {{baseRate}} */, endisc = :P8 /* {{endisc}} */, ennetrate = :P9 /* {{enNetRate}} */, endiscdescription = :P10 /* {{endiscdescription}} */, endiscrate = :P11 /* {{endiscrate}} */, familydiscountdesc = :P12 /* {{familydiscountdesc}} */, familydiscountrate = :P13 /* {{familydiscountrate}} */, familydiscounttotal = :P14 /* {{familydiscounttotal}} */, enrolGrandTotal = :P15 /* {{enrolGrandTotal}} */, debuggerstatus = 'Updated Charge'
WHERE lineInvNumber = :P16 /* {{lineInvNumber_forInsert}} */

INSERT INTO charges_enrolments
(startofweek, classId, studentid, classTypeId, enrolid, classDate, baseRate, endisc, ennetrate, endiscdescription, endiscrate, familydiscountrate, familydiscounttotal, enrolGrandTotal, chargeId, lineInvNumber, isvalid, familydiscountdesc, debuggerstatus) VALUES (:P1 /* {{startofweek}} */, :P2 /* {{classId}} */, :P3 /* {{student}} */, :P4 /* {{classType}} */, :P5 /* {{id}} */, :P6 /* {{classdate.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}} */, :P7 /* {{baseRate}} */, :P8 /* {{endisc}} */, :P9 /* {{enNetRate}} */, :P10 /* {{endiscdescription}} */, :P11 /* {{endiscrate}} */, :P12 /* {{familydiscountrate}} */, :P13 /* {{familydiscounttotal}} */, :P14 /* {{enrolGrandTotal}} */, :P15 /* {{mce.monthlychargeexists.chargeid}} */, :P16 /* {{id.toString() +student.toString() +classdate.toTimestamp()}} */, '1', :P17 /* {{familydiscountdesc}} */, 'Inserted Charge')

INSERT INTO charges_family
(total, family, title, chargeFor_monthly, dueDate, chargeType, basetotal, discountotal, chargeDate, created, createdby) VALUES (:P1 /* {{totals.familygrandtotal}} */, :P2 /* {{$_PARAM.familyid}} */, :P3 /* {{'Family Tuition Charge: ' + charge.chargefor}} */, :P4 /* {{charge.monthlycharge || null}} */, :P5 /* {{$_PARAM.dueDate.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}} */, 'tuition', :P6 /* {{totals.baseRate}} */, :P7 /* {{totals.disctotal}} */, :P8 /* {{$_PARAM.chargeDate}} */, :P9 /* {{NOW_UTC.toLocalTime()}} */, :P10 /* {{$_PARAM.userid}} */)

INSERT INTO charges_enrolments
(startofweek, classId, studentid, classTypeId, enrolid, classDate, baseRate, endisc, ennetrate, endiscdescription, endiscrate, familydiscountrate, familydiscounttotal, enrolGrandTotal, chargeId, lineInvNumber, isvalid, familydiscountdesc) VALUES (:P1 /* {{startofweek}} */, :P2 /* {{classId}} */, :P3 /* {{student}} */, :P4 /* {{classType}} */, :P5 /* {{id}} */, :P6 /* {{classdate.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}} */, :P7 /* {{pricing.baseRate}} */, :P8 /* {{pricing.endisc}} */, :P9 /* {{pricing.enNetRate}} */, :P10 /* {{pricing.endiscdescription}} */, :P11 /* {{pricing.endiscrate}} */, :P12 /* {{pricing.familydiscountrate}} */, :P13 /* {{pricing.familydiscounttotal}} */, :P14 /* {{pricing.enrolGrandTotal}} */, :P15 /* {{insert_mainCharge.identity}} */, :P16 /* {{id.toString() +student.toString() +classdate.toTimestamp()}} */, '1', :P17 /* {{pricing.familydiscountdesc}} */)
